scripts.start-api: cdk synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/FuelpricesAwsStack.template.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.trigger-fetch-event: sam local generate-event cloudwatch scheduled-event | sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/FuelpricesAwsStack.template.json --env-vars env.json -e - data-fetcher-handler
scripts.trigger-cache-event: sam local generate-event s3 put --key=prices/Unleaded95 | sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/FuelpricesAwsStack.template.json --env-vars env.json -e - cache-refresh-handler
scripts.trigger-cache-write-event: sam local generate-event sqs receive-message --body $(cat cache-write-event-body.txt)  | sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/FuelpricesAwsStack.template.json --env-vars env.json -e - cache-write-handler
